title: Naturopathic Medical Clinic
description: A medical practice in Grants Pass, Oregon that focuses on holistic, natural health care for the whole family.
cleaned_text: Naturopathy is the holistic practice of returning a patient to optimal health using a variety of natural therapies and techniques, including nutrition, herbal medicine, and homeopathy. If you are looking to find and treat the cause of disease or optimize your health, the Naturopathic Medical Clinic is the only medical practice in Grants Pass, Oregon that focuses on holistic, natural health care. Shop Online We have partnered with Fullscript to offer an online dispensary that enables you to purchase many of the supplements available within our office from the comfort of your own home. In addition to supplements, you now have access to healthy beauty care, pet care, and cleaning products you may already be purchasing elsewhere. Free shipping with a minimum purchase. Easy product search. Helpful customer service and ordering by phone
